Key Match Events: Bradley Beal scored 25 points off the bench, including 20 in the second half, to help the Suns end a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 win over the Sixers.
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Beal made it clear after the game that he considers himself a starter. Where the Suns place him in the lineup going forward could potentially influence his willingness to consider a trade if Phoenix looks to move him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on January 7, 2025, between the Philadelphia 76ers and the Phoenix Suns.
